----

Description: Short sleeves are adorned with sparkling rhinestones and detail the neckline as well. The sheer back has a small oval cutout. The sweetheart bodice is belted with rhinestones and the pleated peplum hides the hip and waist area. The form fitting skirt flares at the bottom in a trumpet style.
